info.name: Cursus
info.description:
**Cursus API Documentation**

**Overview:**  
The _Cursus_ project is an online course management system that enables instructors to create and manage courses, and allows learners to register and track their learning progress. The API supports core operations such as course creation, instructor management, progress tracking, cart management, payments, and more.

**API Features:**

- **Course Management:** Create, update, and delete courses.
    
- **Instructor Management:** Review and manage instructor information.
    
- **User Support:** User registration, login, cart management, and payment processing.
    
- **Progress Tracking:** Allows learners to monitor their progress and complete courses.
    

**Environment Setup:**  
Use the `{{base_url}}` variable as the main API URL and define other variables like `{{user_id}}` or `{{course_id}}` to easily test requests with dynamic IDs.

EndFragment

item.name: Admin
item.description: The `/admin` endpoints let you manage administrative tasks related to users, including modifying status and adding comments.

item.name: Auth
item.description: The `/auth` endpoints let you handle authentication actions, such as registering and logging in users.

item.name: Bookmark
item.description: The `/bookmark` endpoints let you manage bookmarks for user courses.

item.name: Cart
item.description: The `/cart` endpoints let you manage items in the userâ€™s shopping cart.

item.name: Category
item.description: The `/category` endpoints let you manage course categories for better course organization.

item.name: Course
Track Course's progpress of user's ID

item.description: The `/course` endpoints let you manage course details, from creation to approval and deletion.

item.name: Course Comment
Get all comment of a course

item.description: The `/courseComment` endpoints let you manage user comments on courses.

item.name: Intructor
List all instructors along with user and instructor information

item.description: The `/instructor` endpoints let you manage instructor information, including registration and earnings.

item.name: Order
item.description: The `/order` endpoints let you manage orders related to user purchases.

item.name: Payment
item.description: The `/payment` endpoints let you manage payment records linked to orders.

item.name: Reason
item.description: The `/reason` endpoints let you manage reasons provided by users when canceling a course.

item.name: Step
item.description: The `/step` endpoints let you manage the steps within a course.

item.name: Step Comment
item.description: The `/stepComment` endpoints let you manage comments on individual course steps.

item.name: Step Content
item.description: The `/stepContent` endpoints let you manage content files for specific course steps.

item.name: Transition
item.description: The `/transition` endpoints let you manage transaction records and payout requests.

item.name: User
item.description: The `/user` endpoints let you manage information in user profiles.

item.name: Wallet History
Get wallet history by wallet Id

item.description: The `/walletHistory` endpoints let you view and manage transaction history in the userâ€™s wallet.
